DOC.brief_summary: The present trial investigates the long-term safety, tolerability and efficacy of bosentan in patients with inoperable CTEPH.
DOC.brief_title: Bosentan in Patients With Inoperable Chronic Thromboembolic Pulmonary Hypertension (CTEPH)
DOC.criteria: Patients having completed the 16week treatment period of protocol AC052366 (NCT00313222) Signed informed consent Any major violation of protocol AC052366 (NCT00313222) Pregnancy or breastfeeding
